mapper.select: select count(*) from review where fk_restaurant_id = #{fk_restaurant_id}
mapper.delete: delete from review where reviewer=#{reviewer} and id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into review (id, reviewer, title, content, taste_score, clean_score, kind_score, total_score, create_at, fk_restaurant_id) values (#{id}, #{reviewer}, #{title}, #{content}, #{taste_score}, #{clean_score}, #{kind_score}, #{total_score}, now(), #{fk_restaurant_id})
mapper.select: select * from review order by id desc
mapper.update: update review set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, taste_score=#{taste_score}, clean_score=#{clean_score}, kind_score=#{kind_score}, total_score=#{total_score} where id=#{id} and reviewer=#{reviewer}
